lead: Recent advancements in climate technology and AI are shaping the future of weather forecasting and climate solutions.

stories.title: Rainbow Weather raises $5.5M to refine real-time weather forecasting
stories.summary: Rainbow Weather, a Warsaw-based climate tech startup, has secured $5.5 million in seed funding to enhance its real-time weather forecasting capabilities. The company focuses on hyperlocal, minute-by-minute weather updates, aiming to provide users with precise precipitation forecasts for the next few hours. This innovative approach is expected to fill a gap in the market for short-term weather predictions.

stories.summary: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, believes that advancements in AI could significantly contribute to solving climate change and other global challenges. His vision includes a massive investment of $1 trillion into datacenters, which could have substantial energy demands. This ambitious expansion raises questions about the sustainability of such developments in the context of climate impact.
